name: corbel-composer
description: An example collection for corbel-composer usage

requests.name: 1- Request token (JWT)
requests.description:
Request an accessToken with a JWT assertion

1. In order to generate the JWT assertion, use this [online tool](http://jwt.io/)
    
    1. Introduce this example token in `encoded` field
        
            eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiI5YmRiZDVjNSIsImF1ZCI6Imh0dHA6Ly9pYW0uYnF3cy5pbyIsImV4cCI6MTQyNzgxOTc2OSwic2NvcGUiOiJjb21wb3NyOmNvbXA6YmFzZSJ9.IQBJIuifoL5OLzV_IZF7oHzZVTeDH6UQUd2WU1s4_5Q

    2. Introduce this Header for first field in `decoded`
    
            {
                "typ": "JWT",
                "alg": "HS256"
            }
    
    3. Introduce this Payload for second field in `decoded`
    
       * Expires = [epoch-time](http://www.epochconverter.com/) + 3600 (1hour)
            
                {
                    "iss": "CLIENT_ID",
                    "aud": "http://iam.bqws.io",
                    "exp": 1427799708,
                    "scope": "composr:comp:base"
                }
    
    3. Introduce your secret for third field in `decoded`
    4. Copy updated `JWT_ASSERTION`
    
2. Paste `JWT_ASSERTION` value
3. Send request
4. Save `data.accessToken` for next requests

requests.name: 3- Create phrase
